statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT DISTINCT contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY contact_number DESC;
SELECT patient_name, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2005-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, email FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE medical_history ->> 'blood_type' = 'AB';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, start_time, end_time FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, start_time, end_time FROM patients JOIN therapy_sessions ON patients.patient_id = therapy_sessions.patient_id ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TherapySessions WHERE session_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT med_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, email_address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM TherapySessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT med_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_id, address FROM Patients WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT treatment_plan, doctor_name FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Fever';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT mr.record_id, mr.patient_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, mr.diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords mr JOIN Patients p ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT s.session_id, s.patient_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, s.session_date, s.therapist_name FROM Sessions s JOIN Patients p ON s.patient_id = p.patient_id ORDER BY s.session_date DESC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.medication_name, m.dosage, m.frequency FROM Patients p JOIN Medications m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.frequency = 'Twice a day' ORDER BY p.last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT therapist_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Therapists;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, session_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='Anxiety';
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Therapists WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com'
SELECT p.first_name, m.diagnosis, s.session_date FROM Patients p JOIN MedicalHistory m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN Sessions s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id
SELECT t.first_name, t.last_name, p.amount FROM PaymentHistory p JOIN Therapists t ON p.therapist_id = t.therapist_id ORDER BY p.amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT t.first_name, t.contact_number, s.session_date FROM Therapists t JOIN Sessions s ON t.therapist_id = s.therapist_id WHERE s.session_date >= '2022-01-01'
